original_title: Sri Lanka appoints four new High Court Judges
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); President Ranil Wickremesinghe on Monday (5) appointed four new High Court Judges.

District Judges T.J. Prabhakaran,  P.K. Parana Gamage, and Assistant Secretary General of Parliment Tikiri K. Jayathilaka & Senior State Counsel K.D.Y.M. Nayani Nirmala Kasthuriratne were appointed as High Court Judges.
The President's Media Division said the letters of appointment were presented on Monday (5).
